me.nimnon.nmengine.core

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.nimnon.nmengine.core.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera class, renders slice of the world specified at x and y
    Author:
    Nimnon

      • folow

        public void folow(GameObject object,

        Sets this camera to folow specified object, higher lerp makes the folowing more smooth. lerp can be one at the lowest
        Parameters:
        object - Object to folow
        lerp - Lerp value
